Set OPENAI_API_KEY or ANTHROPIC_API_KEY in your environment (or .env) to get real AI output.

User request was:
Create a social post for our therapeutic riding program with these details:

Details: I can show you the world

Platform(s): facebook

Return only the post text, no preamble. For "both", provide one block that works for both Instagram and Facebook, or two clearly separated sections.
